    <div id="homepagetext">
     Founded in 1987, International Drug Education Association (I.D.E.A.) is a 501(c)(3)
                non-profit organization. I.D.E.A. was established to help educate children and adults
                about the harmful impact of alcohol and other drug abuse. The following educational
                materials (including coloring books and posters) will help you address these staggering problems by providing concise factual
                information on alcohol and other drug abuse. Through the years, I.D.E.A. has also
                promoted education on other safety issues like gang prevention, domestic violence,
                identity theft and Internet safety.
    </div>
    <div align="center" style="font-weight:bold;">
     You can make a positive impact by
     <br/>
     providing drug education for children and adults.
     <br/>
     <br/>
     Help one family, or one child escape
     <br/>
     the tragedy of alcohol and other drug abuse.
    </div>
